Name: MessageArea
Notes: An area that forcibly displays all linked shouting messages when entered.

Obj_arg0.Name: Message Link ID
Obj_arg0.Description: The message link ID of the BMG/MSBT-message that should be displayed. Not to be confused with the MessageId of an object.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
